code:
stateDiagram-v2
    %% ───────── Top-level flow ─────────
    [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> WaitForEntryRequest

    WaitForEntryRequest --> ProcSecCard : reqReadSecurityCard
    ProcSecCard --> WaitForEntryRequest : flagSecurityCardFailure
    ProcSecCard --> ProcBioData        : CardStatus==Valid
    ProcBioData  --> UnlockLockAP      : Authenticated
    UnlockLockAP --> WaitForEntryRequest : evAccessPointLocked

    %% ───────── Composite ① ─────────
    state "ProcessingSecurityCardData" as ProcSecCard {IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] --> ValidatingCard
        ValidatingCard --> WaitForEntryRequest : SecCardFailure / ScFailCount<3
        ValidatingCard --> Fail3Card           : SecCardFailure / ScFailCount>=3
        ValidatingCard --> exit                : CardStatus==Valid

        state Fail3Card {IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] --> DisableAccount
            DisableAccount --> exit : done
        }
        exit --> [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    }

    %% ───────── Composite ② ─────────
    state "ProcessingBiometricData" as ProcBioData {IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> AuthenticatingBio
        AuthenticatingBio --> WaitForEntryRequest : BsTimeout
        AuthenticatingBio --> Fail3Bio           : BioScanFailure / BFailCount>=3
        AuthenticatingBio --> exit               : Authenticated

        state Fail3Bio {IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> DisableAccountB
            DisableAccountB --> exit : done
        }
        exit --> [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    }

    %% ───────── Composite ③ ─────────
    state "UnlockingAndLockingAccessPoint" as UnlockLockAP {IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> Locked
        Locked --> Unlocking : reqUnlockAccessPoint
        Unlocking --> Unlocked : evAccessPointUnlocked
        Unlocked --> Locked : reqLockAccessPoint
    }
